title: Lol Patcher doesnt open
body: Hello, when i try to open my launcher the patcher doesnt show, i've open the task manager and i can see lolpatcher but i can't see it on my desktop, i have opened lol in admin help me please

replies.body:
Hi SuperBanane,

Try restarting your computer and see if you can open League of Legends again. If that doesn't work try the following.

> 1. Restart your computer again to ensure nothing related to League of Legends is running.
2. Go to your Riot Games folder. (Usually C:\Riot Games)
3. Open "League of Legends" then "RADS" then "Projects."
4. Delete the "lol_patcher" folder.
5. Try launching League of Legends as admin again.


Let me know if it works.
